name: Quick Hands
description: After the character to which this card is attached uses a Skill: If this character has a Weapon, then return the Weapon to your hand, and the next time you play a Weapon Card, spend 2 less Elemental Dice.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character to which this card is attached uses a Skill:</color> If this character has a {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon, then return the {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon to your hand, and the next time you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon Card, spend 2 less Elemental Dice.
